bio: Chef Ahmed is a renowned Pakistani chef with over 10 years of experience in the culinary industry. He is known for his creative and innovative dishes that blend traditional Pakistani flavors with modern cooking techniques.

recipes.cooking_method: 1. Cook the rice and set aside. 2. Fry the chicken until browned. 3. Fry the onion until translucent. 4. Add tomatoes and spices and cook until the mixture thickens. 5. Layer the rice and chicken mixture and cook on low heat for 30 minutes.

1. Cook the lamb until tender. 2. Cook the lentils and wheat until soft. 3. Mix the lamb, lentils, and wheat together and add spices. 4. Cook on low heat for several hours until the mixture thickens. 5. Serve hot with ghee on top.

1. Cook the beef until tender. 2. Add spices and cook on low heat for several hours until the mixture thickens. 3. Mix flour with water to create a thick paste. 4. Add the paste to the beef mixture and cook for an additional hour. 5. Serve hot with onion and ginger on top.

1. Mix ground beef with spices, onion, coriander, and mint. 2. Form the mixture into small sausages around skewers. 3. Grill or cook on a barbecue until browned on all sides. 4. Serve hot with mint chutney.
